Key Match Events: Fight between Tyler Herro and Amen Thompson leading to multiple ejections
Post-Match Reflections: Tyler Herro expressed frustration at the fight and praised his team's effort
Heat coach Udoka discussed the altercation and its impact on the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heat comeback after Rockets' cold shooting in the fourth quarter
Herro led all scorers with 27 points, 9 assists, and 6 rebounds
